name: Shakib Al Hasan
player_details: Shakib, Bangladesh's captain, is the leading all-rounder with 1,146 runs and 34 wickets in World Cups. Known for his ability to perform under pressure, he has been a consistent leader both in batting and bowling, holding records like the highest runs by a Bangladeshi in a single World Cup (606 runs in 2019).

name: Mushfiqur Rahim
player_details: Mushfiqur is Bangladesh's experienced wicketkeeper-batsman and the second-highest ODI run-scorer in the team. With over 7,400 ODI runs, his reliable middle-order presence and sharp keeping skills are vital to Bangladesh's performance.

name: Towhid Hridoy
player_details: A promising young batsman, Hridoy brings fresh talent to the team. Known for his aggressive stroke play, he offers flexibility in the batting order.

name: Taskin Ahmed
player_details: Taskin has taken 21 ODI wickets in 2023, making him one of Bangladesh's most consistent pacers. His pace and aggressive bowling style bring depth to the team's bowling lineup.

name: Shoriful Islam
player_details: A left-arm pacer known for his swing, Shoriful adds variety to the Bangladesh bowling attack. His ability to pick up wickets early is valuable in limiting opposition runs.
